title: Multitec Shoei
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072829im_/http:/typophile.com/files/multitec_6193.jpg)

What typeface is used for word "Multitec" from Shoei helmet?

Logo is described here [http://www.logosdatabase.com/logo/multitec\_77140731](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072829/http:/www.logosdatabase.com/logo/multitec_77140731 "http://www.logosdatabase.com/logo/multitec\_77140731") but there's no vector file for download.

Thank you!

Font: 

 Handel Gothic 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072829/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [multitec.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072829/http:/typophile.com/files/multitec.jpg) | 20.66 KB |
author: ledeny

comments.content:
Looks like it has been based on [Handel Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072829/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/handel+gothic): slanted, horizontally scaled and /M top left corner reworked  
Best sample I've found [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317072829/http:/img01.taobaocdn.com/bao/uploaded/i5/T1Ex4aXgzhf0D1upjX.jpg).

Thank you very much Ryuk! :)  
I agree, it's not exactly the same and looks like it's been modified, but I've easily managed to do the same.  
Best regards!
